_sText:
I started create map just from one room and pool in front of its windows, that's what I remembered from my dream...and quite nice resort came from this after few weeks :)

Could be good for few players, because I put one hostage in map, who spawn on 5 different spots in map, so you'll spend some time with look for him.

Known bugs: 

  • Sometimes stupid water reflexion (i set up cheapwaterstartdistance 10 and cheapwaterenddistance 10000)
  • Low FPS near rail behind pool, when you look to the house

 Any reminds about improvement and changes are welcome

If you like this one, check all of my maps here
This map or its parts is also used in my singleplayer mod

Have a fun
Dinus Saurus
